intro-p1: I'm a frontend engineer with a music teaching background, exploring questions that don't fit neatly into categories. Can AI capture tone in translation, not just vocabulary? Can machines learn to hear film music the way editors do? The interesting work happens where the obvious answers don't quite reach.
intro-p2: When I'm not coding, you'll find me analyzing
intro-p2-2: keeping my Italian and German streaks alive
intro-p3: I'm exploring whether the intersection of music and tech is where I belong â€” and everything I've found keeps pulling me deeper.
